name: Dragonette, Shovel
description: The Dragonette, Shovel is a tiny dragon that excels in stealth with a floral camouflage to blend into vegetation.
memorable: Its ability to control the battlefield with burrowing and unique attacks makes it a versatile foe.
goals: To ambush foes and escape combat using its mobility.
relations: May be encountered with other dragon-like creatures or small forest animals.
environment: Forested or garden-like terrains rich with vegetation.
strengths: High mobility with burrowing capabilities and the advantage of camouflage.
weaknesses: Relatively low hit points and AC makes it vulnerable to direct attacks.
attacks: Uses melee attacks like Head Slap for bludgeoning damage, Raking Claws for slashing damage, and Sticky Tongue to manipulate enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Floral Camouflage provides advantage on Stealth checks, enhancing its ambush potential.
senses: Possesses tremorsense and darkvision both at 60 feet, allowing effective navigation in darkness.
skills: Has a +1 modifier in perception, allowing for average observation capabilities.
additional_information: Messy Digger provides disadvantage on opportunity attacks when burrowing.
Squat Body grants advantage on checks against being moved.
Can launch its tongue to manipulate positioning of enemies within 15 feet.
test_queries: tiny dragon that can burrow and ambush
dragon with floral camouflage and digging skills
mobile dragon that uses stealth and traps
quirky dragon that pulls enemies closer
